Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Chechus_2011
Reviews.Content: hotel nice months ago looks pretty free internet connection 2 nice computers downstairs regarding location near sants estacio easy airport costs 36 euros buy t10 es cheaper 2 euros ticket airport easy yuo metro nearby centre city stay prepare yourself walk train metro staff friendly cheap hotel normal rate 100 euros night recommend

Reviews.Title: “Convenient location, great value.”
Reviews.Author: GarryOwen78
Reviews.Content: overall rating hotel somewhat misleading negative reviews evidently refer hotel change management renovation safely ignored top marks value 50 euros double five minutes walk sants estacio exit station thats ideal getting airport catching trains france modern clean mod cons downside wifi wasnt stay computers lobby didnt cause inconvenience staff ok polite reasonably friendly reasonably helpful ordinary youre looking latenight bite eat near hotel bar couple doors direction station called avoid plague ate meat rotten sick days reported police didnt time energy extend stay found prices bookingcom significantly lower prices quoted reception thats worth bearing mind

Reviews.Title: “Dont waste your money”
Reviews.Author: derrickbAucklandNZ
Reviews.Content: expensive pretentious cold hotel charge 15 euro park car 15 euro wifi access didnt bother breakfast im guessing 15 euro bed cold tv spanish channels carpet disgusting wallpaper ripped receptionists answer complain manager bother found hotel day

Reviews.Title: “DON´T EVEN THINK ABOUT IT!”
Reviews.Author: MariaAndersson
Reviews.Content: renovated built carpet disgusting seen nice staff complained poor breakfast undrinkable coffee cheapest bread cheese ham etc scrambled eggs mix internet 9 euro stars bought

Reviews.Title: “Don't rely on a resevation, even when you booked and paid in advance”
Reviews.Author: EdHunt
Reviews.Content: hotel reserved paid weeks advance arriving 9 pm 31st december wishing spend eve center barcelona family told double booked people found 4 couples contract honored offered alternative accommodation airport arrived airport wish stay airport stayed eventually occupied single apologies regrets received difference price double single 2 months
